title: Donation of a tomb
support: Concave marble plaque set in plaster in modern times.

handNote.lettering: Letters with serifs: Α with broken bar, quadrate Ε, square lunate Σ, rhomboid Θ, cursive Ω (Ω at l. 5 as a Μ upside down). Letters at ll. 1-2 are slightly larger than letters in the following lines.

provenanceFound._: Original discovery not recorded, probably from Catania (possibly Siracusa).

provenanceObserved._: Observed by Blackburne (cod. Oxford, coll. Onions, f. 6) and Kaibel in Museo Biscari, later by Korhonen in magazzino del cortile, collezione Biscari (formerly sala VI, 70).

graphics.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana

location.address: Castello Ursino, Piazza Federico II di Svevia, 95121 Catania (CT)
